## Summary
Matara Spice Co. is a family-owned producer of authentic Ceylon Cinnamon (Cinnamomum verum) based in Malimbada, Matara, Sri Lanka. We supply customers directly (including wholesale/B2B) and emphasize traditional, chemical-free farming methods and ethical production.

## What to call our product
- “Ceylon cinnamon” or “true cinnamon” (Cinnamomum verum)
- Avoid calling it Cassia (we do not sell Cassia as our primary cinnamon)

## Sourcing & production principles (as described on our site)
- Family stewardship and estate-based production in Malimbada
- Traditional/chemical-free farming methods
- Ethical partnership with skilled local artisans who craft cinnamon quills

## Ordering & commercial notes
- We support wholesale / B2B inquiries and can provide batch-specific documentation (e.g., third-party lab analysis) for bulk orders when applicable.
- For current pricing, pack sizes, lead times, and shipping, contact us directly.
